page.title: 09ELVERING ON THE RIVER WYE.
page.content: We went elvering from Bigsweir to Brockweir.My dad uses very fine netting in his elver net.My dad went about seven times running this year. He goes every year some times I go too. The numbers of the elvers have dropped this year.My dad caught twenty Kg in weight.My dad got eight pounds for his catch. I took my fishing net along as well and we caught a flat fish. We stuck a stick in the ground and the tide came higher than the stick. There were plenty of little water vole holes. I saw a rabbit hole.When its night time we take a torch. There were lots of other people there but I was the only child there. The river Wye is very deep so I had to take great care. The elvers are just like tiny worms we like to fry ours with bacon when we get home. James Morrison.
